meanings.sent2: Oh swounds! I can't believe it!
meanings.sent3: Swounds! Did you see that magic trick?
meanings.sent4: The news hit him like a thunderbolt, swounds!
meanings.sent5: The sudden noise made her jump, swounds!

meanings.definition: Used as a mild oath or exclamation.
meanings.sent1: Swounds! I forgot my keys again.
meanings.sent2: Swounds! That was a close call!
meanings.sent3: Swounds! I can't believe I ate the whole cake.
meanings.sent4: The unexpected visitor made him exclaim, swounds!
meanings.sent5: The beautiful sunset left her speechless, swounds!
